name: Battle Blaze
description: Battle Blaze (バトルブレイズ) is a 1992 medieval fighting game released for the Arcade and Super Nintendo Entertainment System by Sammy Studios. Players use swords, morningstars, knives, and other weapons to beat up their opponents. The player can either play in a colosseum or on a quest. The eventual goal is defeat the Dark Lord who lives in a castle in the sky.
